name: Glooby
description:
Participation to the Weekly Game Jam #196: Strange Recipe.

You are a shapeshifter blob, you transform based on what you eat. Discover your abilities and solve the puzzles.

Controls
  • move: WASD or arrow keys
  • reset: BACKSPACE
  • help: TAB
Editor

Press F1 to switch to the bundled level editor.

Credits
  • Art / Graphics:  https://moustikouille.itch.io
  • Programming: https://imagicthecat.itch.io

Made with LÖVE (11.3).
